description:
Keita has two older step-sisters, Ako and Riko, but since they aren't related by blood, they love him in a lustful way. After a mishap at school, Ako and Riko finally confess their love to him. Keita dislikes the thought of seeing them other then brother and sister, but as he tries to enter the same school as his sisters, he slowly becomes attracted to them.

(Source: Anime News Network)

Note: The first episode was aired as an online preview on Bandai Channel between 25th and 26th of March 2010. The regular broadcast started on April 5.

tags.name: Inseki
tags.description: Features sexual or romantic relations among step, adopted, and other non-blood related family members.

tags.name: Twins
tags.description: Prominently features two or more siblings that were born at one birth.

tags.name: Female Harem
tags.description: Main cast features the protagonist plus several female characters who are romantically interested in them.

tags.name: Love Triangle
tags.description: Centered around romantic feelings between more than two people. Includes all love polygons.

tags.name: Nudity
tags.description: Features a character wearing no clothing or exposing intimate body parts.

tags.name: Heterosexual
tags.description: Prominently features a romance between a man and a woman, not inherently sexual.

tags.name: School
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a primary or secondary educational institution.

tags.name: Masturbation
tags.description: Features erotic stimulation of one's own genitalia or other erogenous regions.

__Height:__ 151 cm

[Profile (Link Plan)](http://link-plan.net/talent_taketatsu.html) | [Website](http://ayanataketatsu.jp) | [Website (Pony Canyon)](https://ayanataketatsu.jp/) | [Website (Fanclub)](https://ayanakoukoku.com/) | [Blog](https://lineblog.me/ayana_taketatsu/) | [(Old) Blog](https://ameblo.jp/strawberry-ayana/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/Ayana_take) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/ayachi_official/) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/user/taketatsuofficial) | [Anison](http://anison.info/data/person/27399.html) | [Wiki (en)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ayana_Taketatsu) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/竹達彩奈)

Attended Nihon Narration Engi Kenkyuujo before becoming affiliated with her first management company. She works for Link Plan and was formerly affiliated with I'm Enterprise and Assemble Heart. Because of her strong voice, she often voiced tsundere characters.

She is a member of the duo [Petit Milady](https://anilist.co/staff/116523/petit-milady) with fellow voice actress [Aoi Yuuki](https://anilist.co/staff/101686/Aoi-Yuuki).

She married voice actor [Yuuki Kaji](https://anilist.co/staff/95672/) on her 30th birthday in 2019. On June 30, 2022 she announced that she was expecting her first child with Kaji.

[Profile](http://www.imenterprise.jp/data.php?id=81) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/yuiko_ttm0917) | [Anison](http://anison.info/data/person/28005.html) | [Wiki (en)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Yuiko_Tatsumi) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E5%B7%BD%E6%82%A0%E8%A1%A3%E5%AD%90)

She is a voice actress currently affiliated with I'm Enterprise. She graduated from the narration school Nichinare.
__Hiromi Kikuta__ is a Japanese sound director, who works for the company Rakuonsha.

__Height:__ 153cm

[Profile (Style Cube)](http://stylecube.jp/talents/kaori/index.html) | [Website](http://ishiharakaori.com/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kaori_staff_) | [Blog](http://ameblo.jp/ishiharakaori/) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/ishiharakaori_official) | [TikTok](https://www.tiktok.com/@kaori_ishihara)

She won the award of Best Rookie Actress in the 7th Seiyuu Awards. She was a founding member of the group [StylipS](https://anilist.co/staff/111177), before her graduation from the group on April 20, 2013. She was one half of J-Pop duo [YuiKaori](https://anilist.co/staff/195974/), along with [Yui Ogura](https://anilist.co/staff/105981/) before the group disbanded in 2017.

__Non-anime roles:__
- Frima - Goddess of Victory: Nikke (VG)
- Soldier EG - Goddess of Victory: Nikke (VG)
- Tiara - Fairy Fencer F (VG)

**Height:** 150 cm

[Website](http://www.ogurayui.jp) | [Blog](http://ameblo.jp/ogurayui-0815) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/OY_A_Official) | [Twitter (Personal)](https://twitter.com/yui_ogura_815) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCjoIKN4CybsJyv0pWwAUJ5w) | [LINE](https://lineblog.me/ogurayui) | [Clare Voice](http://clare-voice.co.jp/talent) | [YuiKaori](http://www.yuikaori.info) | [Anison](http://anison.info/data/person/27839.html) | [Wikipedia](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E5%B0%8F%E5%80%89%E5%94%AF) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/yui_ogura_official) | [TikTok](https://www.tiktok.com/@yui_ogura_offcial)

Not to be confused with [Yui Ogura (小倉結衣)](https://anilist.co/staff/123771).

Yui Ogura is an idol, actress, singer and voice actress (seiyuu) affiliated with Clare Voice. She is one of four members in Team Dekaris along with Kaori Ishihara, Arisa Noto, and Maho Matsunaga. She was one half of J-Pop duo [YuiKaori](https://anilist.co/staff/195974/), along with [Kaori Ishihara](https://anilist.co/staff/105217/) before the group disbanded in 2017. She is a former member of the seiyuu group [StylipS](https://anilist.co/staff/111177/), which was formed in 2011 and composed of the same members of Team Dekaris. Ogura's debut single "Raise" was released on July 18, 2012. She graduated from the group in April 2013.

__Non-anime roles:__

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/tomos12)

He started working at Studio Deen, where he made his debut as animator in an episode of Dai Guard. After leaving Deen he became freelance and works mainly on productions for J.C.Staff but also on some titles for Bones, Gonzo and Feel. He is particularly renowned as bishoujo animator, since he tends to pay attention to detailed character appearance and traits for girls, as well as providing his characters cute and bashful gestures.
